participant_1.background:
My parents were not a good fit for me, so I moved out when I was 14.
I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
i would like to retire to hawaii in the next 10 years.
i give lessons on string instruments.
i take pride in getting straight as.

participant_2.background:
I love seafood because I fish for it myself.
I went camping with my family at a lake and we all had a great time swimming, hiking and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.
I dress for my audience.
I used to lie to my parents, but now I am more honest with them.
I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.

content.text: I used to lie to my parents a lot as a child, but now I am more honest with them.
I used to lie to my parents too! But now I am more honest with them as well.
What made you change your mind?
I realized that it was better to be honest and up front with them.
That's a good point! I agree.
I am also a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.
That's awesome! I love to do those things too.
We should collaborate on something sometime!
Great! I will send you a link to my portfolio and we can talk more about it.
